t.h5: Business Registration Completed, Here is W-9 forms, We are looking forward to do business with you.

t.t: All information have been completed and is currently under review.
Basic Information Completed, proceed with next step of Business Registration.
Business Registration completed, Kindly add your payment method.
Complete the Business Registration to unlock the odering process.

div.h4: How do you plan to pay for your orders?

div.label: Paid at time of delivery (cash or check)
Apply for credit (takes 3-5 business days for credit check and approval)

div.p: Select the option that best suits you.

div.label: Are you a reseller with a valid resale certificate (most common)?
-or- Are you tax exempt with a valid tax exempt certificate ST-119.1(non-profits etc)
-or- None of the above, you pay sales tax on all purchases

div.p: Enter all the below information to complete onboarding
Enter all the below information to complete onboarding

div.div:
I, the undersigned, authorize S.J. Price, Inc., D/B/A Price Paper, D/B/A Price Paper &Twine (hereafter referred to as ‘the Company”) to perform an ACH debit to the above account to pay invoices billed to the Customer when they are due and payable to the Company. I assert and represent that I have full authority to enter into this agreement and that this authorization is perpetual and will remain in effect unless canceled by notifying the Company in writing seven (7) days before the next debit occurs.
If the payment due date above falls on a weekend or holiday, I understand that the charge may be made on the following business day.

div.p: Enter all the below information to complete onboarding

div.h6: List of name(s) and title(s) of corporate officers, partners or owners:

div.div:
I authorize our bank(s) to furnish financial information required by Price Paper & Twine Company in connection with this application for credit.
We certify that the above statements are true and authorize Price Paper & Twine Company to investigate the information above for the purposes of obtaining merchandise on credit. If the application is a corporation, limited liability company or limited partnership in consideration of granting credit to the applicant, the undersigned individually and not as an officer/director/member of applicant absolutely, unconditionally and personally guarantees and promises to pay Price Paper & Twine Company all indebtedness owned by applicant whenever created or owned and waive all defenses available to a guarantor and further waives all notices, demands any presentments. This guaranty will remain effective until all obligations of applicant are paid in full and all credit relations between Price Paper & Twine Company and the applicant have terminated. I will pay a reasonable attorney fee, collection fee and any other reasonable cost incurred in the collection of said account.
Terms: Credit terms are stated on the invoice under “terms.” Invoices not paid according to terms will be subject to a 2% finance charge per month (21% per annum).

div.p: Enter all the below information to complete onboarding

div.label: Federal EIN:
div.small: FEIN or EIN is a nine-digit number in the format XX-XXXXXXX
